message.content:
Step 1: Determine the age difference between you and your sister when you were 6 years old. Your sister was half your age at that time, so her age would be 3 years younger than yours (6 / 2 = 3).

Step 2: Calculate your sister's age when you turned 80. Since there is no mention of the current age difference between you and your sister, we will assume it remains constant. Therefore, your sister would be 80 - 3 = 77 years old now.

So, your sister is currently 77 years old.
